## Welcome to `notd`! ğŸ‘‹
This is your first note. You can use this space to jot down your thoughts, ideas, or anything else you want to remember.

## Task Management ğŸ“
You can create task lists by starting your notes with the special keywords: `TODO`, `DOING`, `DONE`, `WAITING`, `CANCELLED`, `SOMEDAY`, `NLR` (no longer relevant).

## Shortcuts âŒ¨ï¸
Use text expanders to quickly add properties such as `:t` tags or `:k` keywords, `:d` date or `:d` timestamp.

## Properties âœ¨
Add properties to your notes to organize them further. For example, you can add a {priority::high} property to important notes, set a {favorite::true} or add a {tag::tag}.

## Templates ğŸ¨
Use templates to quickly create notes with a consistent format. Just write `/` to get started.

## Encryption ğŸ”’
Enable encryption for your notes through page properties. Note that this is an experimental feature. After enabling encryption, you'll need to reload the page before adding new notes.

## SQL Queries ğŸ”
You can run SQL queries to get data from your database. Just write `SQL {SELECT * FROM Notes WHERE page_id = 1}` (remove space after `SQL`) to get started.
